categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: House Intari was a guild active in Depatar, a city of the gas giant Genarius. The permitor Furran was affiliated to this house, apparently trying to direct customers to business also affiliated to the house.
This organization is not named. However, the character Furran is identified as Furran of the Intari which seems to be one of the ways a permitor identifies the house he or she is associated with.
